Apart from special education classses which cate for children with moderate learning difficulties - all pupils in the first year follow a 'core' curriculum. This is composed of English, Mathematics, General Science, Welsh, French, Germa, History, Georgraphy, Art and Crafts, Music, Religious Education, Physical Education and organised games. In sampling a variety of subject in their early years, pupils will be better prepared to make subject choices necesary in their later school carears. The school has some thirty activites, clubs and societies ranging from Athletics to musical appreiation and science. Pupils are entered for public examinations at 16 years.
